amendatorysection.para: The aggregate quality assurance assessment shall not exceed the lower of the amount necessary to accomplish the uses specified in section 68-1926 or the maximum amount of gross inpatient revenue that may be assessed pursuant to the indirect guarantee threshold as established pursuant to 42 C.F.R. 433.68(f)(3)(i). The aggregate quality assurance assessment shall be imposed on a per-nonmedicare-day basis.
